name: Sanmitra Trust
briefDescription: Our focus is on women empowerment and community Support. We work among urban poor and sections of women who are marginalized facing stigma and discrimination such as Female Sex Workers,bar girls, transgender, sweepers, dumping ground workers, domestic workers, etc.. We run skill training centre for slum youth who are school drop outs and secure placement and/or self employment opportunities for them. Our women are mostly single and are taught production and marketing skills , self help groups, micro credit linkages and micro entrepreneurship development skills. We also have a group of 100 most vulnerable HIV positive children and their mothers whom we give nutrition , medicine and education support . Every year we reach 1000 beneficiaries directly and 4000 family members indirectly through our programs.
